title: Add --awaiting flag to tk update
description:
Add --awaiting flag to the update command

Usage: tk update <id> --awaiting work|approval|...
       tk update <id> --awaiting=  (clear, return to agent)

Behavior:
- Set or clear the awaiting field
- Setting awaiting moves tick to human queue
- Clearing awaiting returns tick to agent queue
- Validate value is one of the 7 awaiting types or empty

Implementation:
- Add -awaiting and --awaiting flags to update FlagSet
- Use optionalString pattern for nullable field
- --awaiting= (empty) clears the field
- Validate enum value before updating

Use case: Human manually routing task to another human or back to agent
  tk update abc --awaiting work  # Human needs to do this
  tk update abc --awaiting=      # Return to agent
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --awaiting flag added to update command
- [ ] All 7 valid values accepted
- [ ] Empty value clears the field (returns to agent)
- [ ] Invalid values rejected with error
- [ ] Field saved correctly to tick JSON
